ComicInfo.Summary: DRAW! 15 is the big Back To School issue! So you want to go to an art school that offers a degree or major focus on comics and cartooning - but which school is the right one for you? Are you a mainstream type, or the next Harvey Pekar? Either way, choosing the right school is important, and in this issue, Editor-in-Chief Mike Manley covers all the major schools who offer comic art as a major part of their curriculum, from the Center For Creative Studies, SVA, SCAD, the Joe Kubert School, and more! We dig down and interview the faculty, plus some students currently enrolled, as well as past graduates, to give prospective students the best overview to date of collegiate-level comic art classes. Plus, there's an interview with fan-favorite artist Bill Reinhold, and Mike Manley and Bret Blevins provide the latest installment of their acclaimed Comic Art Bootcamp series, chock full of drawing tips and tricks. There's also product reviews, a color section, and more, all behind a new MIKE MANLEY cover! Includes a FREE Preview of WRITE NOW 17, also shipping this month!
